content: "Purity is the opposite of integrity�the cruelest thing you can do to a person is make her ashamed of her own complexity. The stories of our lives have no morals. Any single conclusion drawn would be false; the episodes, taken together, are untranslatable, incomparable. If we are to conclude at all, we can only conclude against conclusions." -an excerpt from

content: CrimethInc. Letters book. This is not direct propaganda, nor is it similar in most regards to previous CrimethInc. publications. This is a new voice, a new form, a new idea, but born of the same fires.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p font span
content: These are our letters�to the universe. To each other. This is where we re-write our histories and create our own cultures without the mediation of corporations. When we are too far away from one another for campfire storytelling, we use our own voices here, and we use them to call out across the distance.

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p font em font span
content: Authors in the Letters series receive 10-20% (a sliding scale based on their financial situation) of the gross revenue for the book as payment: this is our effort to actually build sustainability into our pricing structure rather than nurture yet another generation of victimized, starving artists.
